query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS campaigns (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  goal ENUM('awareness', 'engagement', 'traffic', 'conversions', 'followers') NOT NULL,
  target_metric VARCHAR(50),
  target_value VARCHAR(50),
  start_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  end_date TIMESTAMP,
  budget VARCHAR(50),
  status ENUM('active', 'paused', 'completed', 'archived') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
  tags JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4FiUfikgDQU4MHP.4fff9066d80d --database U34NkkLJbrpbDaDFLXHvpq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS campaigns (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  goal ENUM('awareness', 'engagement', 'traffic', 'conversions', 'followers') NOT NULL,
  target_metric VARCHAR(50),
  target_value VARCHAR(50),
  start_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  end_date TIMESTAMP,
  budget VARCHAR(50),
  status ENUM('active', 'paused', 'completed', 'archived') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
  tags JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
